content: "If I'm not mistaken, he will have responsibility for NATO forces in Afghanistan." This is almost true. He will be one of the commanders of forces in Afghanistan, but that is also a situation that contradicts the military principle of unity of command. General McKiernan is the commander on the ground in Afghanistan, just like General Odierno is in Iraq. However, he reports to General Petraeus at CENTCOM and to the SACEUR which will be Admiral Stavridis.
reply: "If I'm not mistaken, he will have responsibility for NATO forces in Afghanistan." This is almost true.
